alert.note: Alert for Coffee (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 10:20PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Coffee and Jeff Davis Counties through 1115 PM EDT... At 1020 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lumber City to 9 miles south of Rhine to 10 miles south of Pitts. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and excessive cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Locations impacted include... Hazlehurst, Pridgen, Snipesville and Denton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
